content.svp: Manage the lifecycle of various asset data and information, from creation to archiving, with appropriate authorization control
content.parent_description: Ability to create, update, delete, and archive asset master, transactional, time series, and events data. It also involves the same management of business rules, unstructured data (documents, drawings of design models, and pictures), and location and spatial information across asset types including historical data according to data quality requirements.
description: Keep the master records of assets from acquisition through procurement or commissioning of a capital project, including functional and financial information, to archiving the data at the end of the assets' lifecycles.

Manage both master and transactional data required for asset management, such as assets, their associated unstructured data (documents and drawings), maintenance notifications and orders, lists of maintenance activities, and financial data related to the assets and maintenance, such as costs and other accounting information.
Enforce and audit access to data and information with appropriate authorization control across the organization.

content.svp: Establishes standards for asset data modeling and common asset data taxonomy across asset stakeholders and the whole asset lifecycle
content.parent_description: Ability to specify and establish standards for asset information to assure consistency, accuracy, and completeness throughout the asset management lifecycle and enable effective decision-making and optimization of asset performance. Asset information standards comprise the classification of assets to an agreed hierarchy, which allows for creation and management of the overall asset inventory. Additionally, they define the required attributes, common methods for categorizing asset defects and failures, and techniques for assessing and recording asset utilization and condition.

content.svp: Define and record the functional and physical attributes of assets, including the links between their components and changes over time
content.parent_description: Ability to identify, record, and manage the functional and physical attributes of assets, software, and related documentation including the links between the components of a system. It enables systematic control of changes to the identified asset attributes for maintaining integrity and traceability throughout the asset lifecycle.
description: Manage the structural links between components that make up a unit of an asset with various attributes for each component.

Record the detailed histories of serialized components and the events that are related to them, such as moving locations, acquisition through procurement, or installation and removal, with links to the related activities that caused such events, such as refurbishment orders, purchase orders for asset acquisition, or logistics movement.

Manage various characteristics that can be flexibly defined to describe different classes of assets, such as physical characteristics like size, dimensions, or weight, operational attributes like operational hours, and location and spatial information.

content.svp: Apply reliability methodology across the asset lifecycle to assure optimal maintenance strategies for desired function and performance
content.parent_description: Ability to systematically apply reliability engineering principles and techniques throughout an asset’s lifecycle to assure its ability to perform a required function under given conditions for a given time interval. This involves identifying potential reliability issues as early as possible in the asset's lifecycle and making sure that all reliability requirements are met.
description: Follow a systematic and strategic approach to make sure assets perform their intended functions reliably throughout their lifecycles.
Identify and address potential failures, implement preventive and predictive maintenance strategies, and optimize asset performance.
Minimize unplanned downtime, extend asset life, and maximize overall operational efficiency.
Make data-driven decisions, conduct risk assessments, maintain condition monitoring, and facilitate continuous improvement.
Optimize maintenance activities, reduce costs, enhance safety, and improve the overall reliability and availability of critical assets.

content.svp: Drive savings and support supplier financial health by providing early-payment options across your supply chain
content.parent_description: Dynamic discounting involves the systematic reduction in payment terms or overall material and service costs based on volume and payment days outstanding agreed upon by both parties to a transaction.
description: Dynamic discounting solution enables you to deploy your excess cash for risk-free return. Your suppliers choose which invoices to accelerate.The earlier the payment, the greater the discount.
The platform is designed automate end-to-end process including reconciliation and provide best customer experience.
Our solution offers efficient onboarding and giving suppliers control over early payments according to their own business needs which is critical to the adoption.
With our predictive analytics solution we can help you to make informed decisions on your objectives - Maximising discount yield or strengthen your supply chain

content.svp: Free up working capital through supply chain financing
content.parent_description: Supply chain finance involves providing a means for buyers and suppliers to leverage materials in their supply chains for financing activities, loans, or payments.
description: Explore Taulia’s Supply Chain Finance (a.k.a Reverse Factoring) that frees up the cash that supports your entire supply chain and offer your suppliers a reliable stream of cash using third-party funding. Your suppliers receives early payment without recourse on their invoices (improved DSO)and you pay the funder in line with your agreed payment terms.

Solution offers seamless integration with your ERP to exchange approved invoice information and maintain payee as the funder for early paid invoices ensuring no change to existing payment process. At the same time offers your supplier to request for early payment on all invoices (cashflow) or on selective invoices.
Solution offering helps to build a plan that supports your ESG goals

content.svp: Free up working capital and streamline accounts payable processes through virtual cards payment
content.parent_description: A virtual card is a virtual rather than a physical payment method. It functions similarly to a traditional credit card but takes the form of a single-use account number that is auto-generated online and generally issued as payment electronically. Virtual cards are accepted anywhere traditional cards are used and come with a range of features, controls, and benefits that make them uniquely valuable to businesses.
description: Update your system's payment method to onboard and pay suppliers accepting virtual card payments
Utilize your company's existing commercial credit when your issuer is on the Mastercard In Control for Commercial Payments platform
Operate virtual cards side-by-side with existing payables programs like supply chain finance or dynamic discounting
Establish additional payment controls to mitigate fraud and increase accounts payable efficiency with automation and consolidated statements
Benefit from using credit to extend payment terms and/or create additional rebate opportunities

content.parent_description: Healthcare Big Data integration involves leveraging existing connections and integration tools with an open framework to pull insights from Big Data and enterprise stores.​
description: Create complex, multistep, and reusable data pipelines to process, refine, and enrich data at the source.
Execute powerful data flows quickly by using distributed local processing with scheduling and monitoring across the data landscape.
Execute and orchestrate unified workflows in a given order, including data pipelines, file operations, and data flow graphs.

Healthcare Big Data Integration.description: Healthcare Big Data integration involves leveraging existing connections and integration tools with an open framework to pull insights from Big Data and enterprise stores.​

content.svp: Broaden the scope of clinical data analysis through scientific data modeling
content.parent_description: Scientific data modeling includes the enrichment of the clinical data model with genomic information and the expanded support for clinical analysis through ontologies.
description: Capture genomic data for inclusion in clinical data analysis through genomic data modeling.
Advance modeling by loading genomic data from related documents and gene sequence files into a genomic model linked to a clinical data model.
Improve knowledge sharing by making the genomic data available and using ontology data for inclusion in clinical data analysis with ontology data modeling.
Reduce data costs by loading ontology content from various external providers into a common data model.
Improve analysis processes with code translation, categorization, and other ontology services.

Scientific Data Modeling.description: Scientific data modeling includes the enrichment of the clinical data model with genomic information and the expanded support for clinical analysis through ontologies.

content.svp: Create high-performance predictive modeling by automating or choosing algorithms including your own
content.parent_description: Healthcare predictive analytics involve applying predictive algorithms and machine learning to uncover trends and patterns and anticipate better patient and business outcomes.
description: Build predictive models within days by using automated techniques that require no code experience
Gain quick access to a wide variety of algorithms that allows data scientists to configure and fine-tune parameters with ease
Accelerate decisions and scale to mass adoption with native predictive modeling of Big Data

content.svp: Anticipate better patient and business outcomes with predictive analytics
content.parent_description: Healthcare predictive analytics involve applying predictive algorithms and machine learning to uncover trends and patterns and anticipate better patient and business outcomes.
description: Confidently anticipate future needs with predictive analytics to guide more patient-oriented outcomes.
Uncover trends and patterns by accessing information from health-related transactions, medical equipment, and healthcare ecosystems.
Reveal new or expanded opportunities by using predictive results in clinical and administrative processes.

Healthcare Predictive Analytics.description: Healthcare predictive analytics involve applying predictive algorithms and machine learning to uncover trends and patterns and anticipate better patient and business outcomes.

content.svp: Turn data into insights with the power of information visualization solutions
content.parent_description: Information visualization includes combining data from multiple sources and turning that data into intuitive visualizations to extract insight. It also involves analyzing trends and delivering critical information using infographics and data stories that captivate audiences.
description: Help business users find insight in their data by turning data into intuitive visualizations.
Improve data-driven decisions by delivering critical information using infographics and data stories to business users no matter where they are.
Realize use cases such as Antibiotics Stewardship and Opioid and Drug Abuse using a highly flexible, modern analytics cloud solution that is easy to model and intuitive to use.
Give top decision-makers real-time, digital-enterprise insight into integrated business data from SAP and third-party applications for better decision-making.

Information Visualization.description: Information visualization includes combining data from multiple sources and turning that data into intuitive visualizations to extract insight. It also involves analyzing trends and delivering critical information using infographics and data stories that captivate audiences.

content.svp: Improve patient analytics and clinical research outcomes with patient cohort management solutions
content.parent_description: Patient cohort management involves grouping patients according to a wide variety of criteria and managing them efficiently to quickly identify candidates for clinical trials. It also includes reintegrating cohorts in analytical scenarios to improve patient care.
description: Build patient cohorts quickly and manage them efficiently with analytical or other search scenarios.
Improve care by reintegrating cohorts found in a search of analytical scenarios.
Start researching faster by restricting patient data to the population that best matches your research needs.
Enable researchers to collaborate on patient cohorts and trigger tasks for execution.
Analyze patient data to verify research hypotheses by exploring patient attributes to determine new search criteria
Get a comprehensive, chronological view into your patient's history with patient viewer capabilities.
Tailor cohort management to your specific research needs using visualization configuration.

Patient Cohort Management.description: Patient cohort management involves grouping patients according to a wide variety of criteria and managing them efficiently to quickly identify candidates for clinical trials. It also includes reintegrating cohorts in analytical scenarios to improve patient care.

description: Structure information from textual sources using natural-language processing functions based on linguistic, statistical, and machine-learning algorithms.
Increase the amount of data for analysis by extracting clinical entities and facts from unstructured data for integration with structured data.
Support better care with real-time insight into data.

Unstructured Text Analysis.description: Unstructured text analysis involves analyzing unstructured, textual sources such as physicians’ letters and reports using natural-language processing to unlock the tremendous value of buried clinical information.

content.svp: Leverage item serialization for automation and product traceability for compliance
content.parent_description: Item serialization and product traceability include tracking the location and condition of serialized products over their lifecycles to enable regulatory compliance.
description: Offer full visibility into the lifecycle of serialized products and track products across multiple systems.
Commission and encode tags to GS1, EPCIS, and other standards and automate material handling with auto-ID technologies.
Expedite recalls, facilitate compliance with traceability directives, identify roadblocks, and improve customer service.​

content.svp: Gain high-resolution tracking insights spanning the lifecycle of uniquely identified products, parts, logistics assets, and components
content.parent_description: Item serialization and product traceability include tracking the location and condition of serialized products over their lifecycles to enable regulatory compliance.
description: Centrally manage the generation and distribution of unique identifiers for item serialization of products as well as parts, components, and logistics assets.

Link item-serialized parts, components, and products to their related lots.
Run a central repository solution for item serialization optimized to manage high data volumes.
Integrate with SAP S/4HANA, SAP Extended Warehouse Management, and third-party solutions and capture business transactions and events from distributed systems.

content.svp: Comply with worldwide regulations governing item-level serialization for pharmaceutical products
content.parent_description: Item serialization and product traceability include tracking the location and condition of serialized products over their lifecycles to enable regulatory compliance.
description: Manage all serialization data in an EPCIS-compliant corporate repository for greater efficiency
Streamline the compliance process by integrating line-level packaging systems, enterprise master data, as well as contract manufacturers and other logistics partners
Report serialization data compliant with individual requirements across a growing list of jurisdictions requiring such reporting (the EU, USA, China, and Russia, for example) with greater ease

Item Serialization and Product Traceabil.description: Item serialization and product traceability include tracking the location and condition of serialized products over their lifecycles to enable regulatory compliance.

content.svp: Free up working capital through supply chain financing
content.parent_description: Supply chain finance involves providing a means for buyers and suppliers to leverage materials in their supply chains for financing activities, loans, or payments.
description: Explore Taulia’s Supply Chain Finance (a.k.a Reverse Factoring) that frees up the cash that supports your entire supply chain and offer your suppliers a reliable stream of cash using third-party funding. Your suppliers receives early payment without recourse on their invoices (improved DSO)and you pay the funder in line with your agreed payment terms.

Solution offers seamless integration with your ERP to exchange approved invoice information and maintain payee as the funder for early paid invoices ensuring no change to existing payment process. At the same time offers your supplier to request for early payment on all invoices (cashflow) or on selective invoices.
Solution offering helps to build a plan that supports your ESG goals
